name: Chafee Grant for Foster Youth
description: Up to $5,000/year for college or vocational training for foster youth through age 26
fullDescription: The Chafee Grant provides up to $5,000 per year for current and former foster youth to pay for career and technical training or college expenses.
whatTheyOffer:
- Up to $5,000 per academic year
- Covers tuition, fees, books, supplies
- Can cover living expenses
- Available through age 26
- For vocational training or college
- Does not have to be repaid
howToGetIt:
1. Must be current or former foster youth
2. Must be age 16-26
3. Complete FAFSA or CA Dream Act application
4. Check box for foster youth status
5. Enroll in eligible school or training program
6. Grant automatically considered
keywords: Chafee Grant, foster youth, $5000, college grant, vocational training, tuition, living expenses, FAFSA, CA Dream Act, ages 16-26
